Talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Admiration_00>I see you've brought the materials I need.
I can make a <clr:0000>Great Eagle Bow<clr:ffff> with these.<sp:0:4:0>But are you certain I can have these?
Diamonds don't come cheap, you know.
Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>I was proud to bequeath my <clr:0000>Great Eagle
Bow<clr:ffff> to my fully-fledged son, of course.<sp:0:4:0>But...it does leave me without the bow
I've used for so long.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>An elder shouldn't go unarmed, so I'll
be crafting myself another one as soon
as I can.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>The bow I gave Tulin was a masterpiece.
After so many years of use, it was like
another limb for me.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>But I think I have it in me to craft one
just as good.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>If you want your own <clr:0000>Great Eagle Bow<clr:ffff>,
I wouldn't mind crafting one for you too
while I'm at it.<sp:0:4:0>I'll need a swallow bow, five bundles of
wood, and three diamonds.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>Those materials might not be easy to
come by, but if you can collect them all,
then the bow is yours.
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Come to me again once you've collected
the necessary materials.
Talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>Hmm? You don't have all the materials I
asked for. You still need a <clr:0000>swallow bow<clr:ffff>.
Talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh? You already have the materials
I need. <sp:5:0:0>Then I can get to work on the
bow right away.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:TalkPositive_01>Diamonds don't come cheap though...<sp:5:1:0>
Are you certain I can use them?
Talk13:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>Hmm? You don't have all the materials I
asked for. You still need <clr:0000>three diamonds<clr:ffff>.
Talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Understood. Hand those materials here.
On my honor, I'll make you a bow worthy
of the Rito.<sp:0:4:0>Why, even the Rito's finest craftsman,
Harth, vouches for my work. I'll make you
a masterpiece as good as any of his.
Talk14:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>Link...you didn't bring a <clr:0000>swallow bow<clr:ffff> or
all <clr:0000>three diamonds<clr:ffff>.
Talk05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>It's all finished. <sp:5:1:0>Here you are, Link.<sp:0:4:0>A <clr:0000>Great Eagle Bow<clr:ffff>, as promised. I'm
pleased with how it turned out. Use it
in health!
Talk05_00_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>It's all finished. Here you are.<sp:0:4:0>This <clr:0000>Great Eagle Bow<clr:ffff> is for you, Link.<sp:5:1:0>
I'm pleased with how it turned out. Use it
in health!
Talk15:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>Hmm? You don't have all the materials I
asked for. You still need <clr:0000>five bundles
of wood<clr:ffff>.
Near01: This calls for a new bow...
Talk16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>Link...you didn't bring a <clr:0000>swallow bow<clr:ffff> or
all <clr:0000>five bundles of wood<clr:ffff>.
Talk05_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>If the bow ever breaks, return here and
let me know. <sp:5:1:0>So long as we can get the
materials, I'll make you another one.
Talk07:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_01>I see. The offer stands should you change
your mind.
Talk17:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>Link...you're still missing some things.<sp:5:1:0>
This isn't all <clr:0000>five bundles of wood <clr:ffff>or all
<clr:0000>three diamonds<clr:ffff>.
Talk08:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>To make a Great Eagle Bow, I need a
swallow bow, five bundles of wood, and
three diamonds.
Talk18:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>Link...you didn't bring any of the materials
I asked about. <sp:5:1:0>I can't make you a bow out
of nothing.
